format.description:
Description

Options to configure code formatting.
format.option:
Type: FormatOptions/null

Available Sub-options:
  - docstring-code-format: Whether to format code snippets in docstrings.
  - docstring-code-line-length: Set the line length used when formatting code snippets in docstrings.
  - exclude: A list of file patterns to exclude from formatting in addition to the files excluded globally (see [`exclude`](#exclude), and [`extend-exclude`](#extend-exclude)).
  - indent-style: Whether to use spaces or tabs for indentation.
  - line-ending: The character Ruff uses at the end of a line.
  - preview: Whether to enable the unstable preview style formatting.
  - quote-style: Configures the preferred quote character for strings. The recommended options are
  - skip-magic-trailing-comma: Ruff uses existing trailing commas as an indication that short lines should be left separate.
